name: actors_get_all_filmography
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool online_movie_database.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about films, actors, characters,etc... to create a movie/series/streaming content site/application
API description: Retrieves the complete filmography of a specified actor or actress using their unique identifier (nconst).

nconst.description: Unique identifier for the actor or actress. This value starts with "nm" and can be obtained from endpoints such as .../actors/list-born-today or .../actors/list-most-popular-celebs.
